hero.title: Maybe an overly enthusiastic software developer who does what he enjoys.
hero.subTitle: I work with modern technologies, but when needed, I like to learn new things.
projects.title: Curently working on?
projects.github.text: Or even better checkout my Github
hobbies.title: What do I enjoy?
hobbies.subTitle: Being a modern technology enthusiast for me, I'm especially known for constantly learning something new. My favorites in development at the moment are mainly - React (Next.JS) and Firebase, and if you're interested in more - you can find my whole stack here.
about.title: About me
about.subTitle: I'm a student and software developer, currently allocated at Ackee. My passion is to create web apps. I'm enthusiast about new technologies,  new ways to do things better and meet some new friends along with that. My goal is to make all my creations fast, secure and modern. After a perfectly done job, I'd love to chat with you about anything from the IT world in general or the topic you have in mind :)
